sentences.sContent: In the future, shopping can be done by videophone.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the future, shopping can be done by videophone.
sentences.sCn: 在将来，购买东西能在可视电话中进行。

sentences.sContent: The word "ready" appears on the screen of the videophone.
sentences.sContent_eng: The word "ready" appears on the screen of the videophone.
sentences.sCn: 可视电话机的荧屏上出现了“请通话”这个词。

sentences.sContent: Things like videophone and videoconferencing are usually called video services. This type is also regarded as multimedia services.
sentences.sContent_eng: Things like videophone and videoconferencing are usually called video services. This type is also regarded as multimedia services.
sentences.sCn: 比如可视电话、会议电视等，这些被称作视像业务，也叫多媒体业务。

trans.tranOther: a type of telephone that allows you to see the person you are talking to on a screen
